title: Ezilon map fonts
content:
Anyone know which fonts are used on Ezilon.com maps? E.g. [http://www.ezilon.com/maps/oceania/new-zealand-road-maps.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140306031227/http:/www.ezilon.com/maps/oceania/new-zealand-road-maps.html "http://www.ezilon.com/maps/oceania/new-zealand-road-maps.html")? Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140306031227im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ezilon%20font_3663.jpg)
author: randomcaps

comments.content: comments on another map thread [104394](http://web.archive.org/web/20140306031227/http:/typophile.com/node/104394) may be of help.
